name: Digital Journal Hub
description: The ultimate system to revolutionise how you journal — all within Notion.Effortlessly organise your thoughts and cultivate a daily journaling habit with the Journal Hub.Enjoy pre-written prompts and a beautifully streamlined experience that helps you maintain multiple journals and easily reflect on your thoughts — all within your Notion-powered workspace.What’s IncludedMain Dashboard - A central place to access all your journal entries, favorite journals, and automated buttons to create new entr
features: Main Dashboard- A central place to access all your journal entries, favorite journals, and automated buttons to create new entries.; Journal Database- Create, organise, and categorise multiple journals (Gratitude, Mindfulness, Travel, etc.) for different aspects of your life.; Journal Entry Database- Seamlessly create new entries within your journals with pre-filled prompts to get you started.; Today’s Entries Section- Quick access to today’s reflections and thoughts.; Past Entries Section- Look back at yesterday’s entries, this day last week, or last month for easy tracking.; All-Time Favourites Section- Pin your most cherished journal entries for easy recall.; Create Multiple Journals: Easily create and name different journals depending on the type of entries (e.g., Gratitude, Travel, Wellness).; Start New Entries Effortlessly: Use automated buttons to instantly create new entries with pre-filled prompts, making it frictionless to start writing.; Organize and Access Entries: Each new entry is neatly categorised within its parent journal, making it easy to review and reflect.; View Today’s Entries: Keep track of all entries made today directly on the dashboard.
